subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Benched earlier in the week because of a hitting slump, Juan Lagares contributed in a win over Washington with a two-run shot and an acrobatic catch to rob the Nationals’ Jayson Werth.
snippet: Benched earlier in the week because of a hitting slump, Juan Lagares contributed in a win over Washington with a two-run shot and an acrobatic catch to rob the Nationals’ Jayson Werth.
